detail_desc: Trousers in superstretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs.
Trousers in superstretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs.
Trousers in superstretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs.

Ankle-length suit trousers in soft stretch jersey with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique. Slightly shorter legs that are close-fitting at the thighs and knees and taper to the hems to create a flattering silhouette.

Ankle-length suit trousers in soft stretch jersey with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique. Slightly shorter legs that are close-fitting at the thighs and knees and taper to the hems to create a flattering silhouette.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems.

Pyjamas with a pair of bottoms and a long-sleeved nursing top in soft jersey. Top with long sleeves, a wrapover, lace-covered V-neck and a gathered seam under the bust. Bottoms with wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy and straight legs with lace trims at the hems. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.

Pyjamas with a ribbed, long-sleeved top and patterned bottoms in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with a V-neck and wrapover top for easier nursing access. Bottoms with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.

Pyjamas with a ribbed, long-sleeved top and patterned bottoms in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with a V-neck and wrapover top for easier nursing access. Bottoms with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.

Pyjamas with a ribbed, long-sleeved top and patterned bottoms in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with a V-neck and wrapover top for easier nursing access. Bottoms with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy, denim-look Tencel™ lyocell weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a sewn-on fabric tie belt at the front. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Fully lined, off-the-shoulder bikini top with short puff sleeves and a drawstring at the front. Elastication around the top, sleeves and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a drawstring at the sides and medium coverage at the back.

Shaping bikers in microfibre with an extra-high waist. The bikers have a sculpting effect on the whole of the waist area and a push-up effect on the bum with the help of mesh reinforcements and rounded seams.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset and laser-cut edges. The briefs have a light sculpting effect on the waist, bum and hips.

Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, wide smocking at the back, a concealed zip in one side and a seam at the waist with a gently flared peplum. Lined at the top.

Long, flared skirt in a double layer of softly draping, voluminous tulle. High waist with a grosgrain waistband and an elasticated section and concealed zip at the back. Lined with two layers of woven fabric.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a square neckline front and back.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a square neckline front and back.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a square neckline front and back.
Loafers with a moccasin seam and decorative buckle at the front. Low heels and patterned soles.
Loafers with a moccasin seam and decorative buckle at the front. Low heels and patterned soles.

Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.

Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.

Pyjamas in soft pile. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft pile. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved, fitted top in stretch, ribbed jersey.
Short-sleeved, fitted top in stretch, ribbed jersey.
Body in jersey with narrow shoulder straps. Lined over the bust and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Straight-cut shirt jacket in soft imitation suede with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket, patch front pockets and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed jersey. Press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y). The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Leggings in soft, ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
Necklaces in various lengths and designs. Adjustable length 33-41.5 cm, 39-46.5 cm and 41-48.5 cm.
Jacket in organic cotton corduroy with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a decorative chest pocket and fake flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Cotton jersey dress with a patterned tulle skirt. Glittery print motif on the front, short cap sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Satin-lined skirt.
Cotton jersey dress with a patterned tulle skirt. Glittery print motif on the front, short cap sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Satin-lined skirt.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Shirt in an organic cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Pull-on trousers in soft, organic cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake fly, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Pull-on trousers in soft, organic cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake fly, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Jumper in soft, cable-knit organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, patch front pockets and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Hat in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed hem.
Scarf in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed trim on each short side.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with pointed toes, a visible zip in one side and covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Fine-knit socks in various designs with a fold-down shaft.
Ankle boots in grained imitation leather with pointed toes, block heels, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 4.5 cm.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in softly draping jersey with a small stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Pleats at the shoulder seams to create draping at the top, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Long-sleeved dress in glittery-patterned tulle with a small frilled collar and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated cuffs with a flounce, a seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Long-sleeved dress in glittery-patterned tulle with a small frilled collar and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated cuffs with a flounce, a seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Jacket in woven fabric with heat-pressed quilting and a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. Lined hood with an elastic drawstring, a zip down the front, side pockets and an inner pocket. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, waffle-knit cotton with a small appliqué at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, waffle-knit cotton with a small appliqué at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Jetted front pockets, decorative slits at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
